html:
Synopsis

Several companies, including KPI Green Energy and RedTape, have upcoming record dates for corporate actions. Investors must hold shares before the ex-date to qualify for dividends, bonuses, or splits. The T+1 settlement system generally aligns record and ex-dates, but exceptions may occur due to market holidays.

KPI Green Energy and RedTape and several other companies are set to draw attention in the upcoming week as their record dates for corporate actions like dividends, bonus shares, right issue and stock splits approach.

The record date is key for identifying shareholders eligible for these benefits. Investors must ensure their shares are in their demat account by this date to qualify for the announced corporate actions.

To be eligible, shareholders need to buy the stock at least one day before the ex-date, as settlements follow a T+1 cycle. Buying shares on the ex-date does not qualify investors for dividends, bonuses, or splits.

With the T+1 settlement system, the record date and ex-date often align, simplifying tracking for investors. However, this can differ if a market holiday falls after the ex-date.


Here are the stocks with record dates for various actions next week, according to the StockEdge data:

Monday, December 30


Bonus issue

Banco Products (India) declared a 1:1 bonus issue.

Tuesday, December 31

Rights issue

Harshil Agrotech announced a rights issue of 2 shares for every 5 shares held at Rs. 2.43 per share.

Pro Fin Capital Services announced a rights issue of 1 share for every 2 shares held at Rs. 4.5 per share.

Sharanam Infraproject and Trading announced a rights issue of 4 shares for every 5 shares held at Rs. 1 per share.

Also read: Tech View: Nifty forms Doji candle but crosses 200-DMA? What traders should do on Monday

Wednesday, January 1

Bonus issue

Surya Roshni announced a 1:1 bonus share issue, fixing January 1 as the record date.

Thursday, January 2

Stock split

Getalong Enterprise announced a stock split from a face value of Rs 10 per share to Re 1 per share.

Friday, January 3

Dividend

Redtape announced an interim dividend of Rs 2 per share.

Bonus issue

Ceenik Exports (India) announced a 1:5 bonus share issue.

Enser Communications announced a 1:1 bonus share issue.

Garware Technical Fibres announced a 4:1 bonus share issue.

KPI Green Energy announced a 1:2 bonus share issue.

Stock split

Banganga Paper Industries announced a stock split from a face value of Rs 10 per share to Re 1 per share.
